title: Letters, Faxes & E-Mail: U.S. welcoming to foreigners
body:
The editorial "Immigrants deserve better welcome" (Aug. 12) suggests that illegal immigrants be granted legal 
representation.ConstitutionIt takes little imagination to see the backlog this would create in the courts. This would 
increase the detention time and only delay the inevitable deportation. This is a remarkable country that welcomes 
foreigners to settle here. The INS treats these people with courtesy and correctness. I know whereof I speak for I 
am a legal immigrant.

BOB JOHNSON

Johnson, of Lilburn, is an engineer.
